name: Transporter Euro Truck Car 18
description:
Transporter Euro Truck Car 18 is a brand new story game where you can enjoy cargo simulation and crazy stunts on same time. Go on your truck driving. Roads are curly and fuel is short. You are a truck cargo driver in year 2018.
Features:
Easy to play
Smooth and steady controls
Different Maps
Different Trucks
Weather Variations
Day and Night modes
Special Impossible Mission
